subject: Your Fund Transfer
body:
JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A., 
Headquarters, 270 Park Avenue, 
New York, NY. 
UNITED STATES AMERICA 
 
 ATTN BENEFICIARY  (Your Fund Transfer $55.5 MILLION,) 
 
  FUND TRANSFER FORM Customer under this category are hereby advised to fill,  and return this transfer processing form. my working ID attached 
 
 
 Full Name :

 Phone : 
 
 Bank Name :

 Account     Name :

 Mr. Daniel  Pinto 
 Hereby certified that the bank information provided above are correct to the best of my knowledge, to effect my payment upon my compliances with above stipulates transfer obligation without any delays as remittance id valid for 72 hours

subject: Re: Your Fund Transfer
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite intrigued by this fund transfer form you've mentioned. Could you please provide more details about it? What is the purpose of this form and how does it work?

Also, I noticed that you mentioned a certain Mr. Daniel Pinto. May I ask who he is and what his role is in this process?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: Your Fund Transfer
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite intrigued by this fund transfer form you've mentioned. Could you please provide more details about it? What is the purpose of this form and how does it work?

Also, I noticed that you mentioned a certain Mr. Daniel Pinto. May I ask who he is and what his role is in this process?

I'm looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Your Fund Transfer
body:
JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A., 
Headquarters, 270 Park Avenue, 
New York, NY. 
UNITED STATES AMERICA 
 
 Attention: Customer  Your Fund Transfer $55.5 MILLION, 
 
MY  ATTACHMENT OF MY WORKING I.D. FOR YOUR PROOF I WILL ALSO LIKE YOU TO SEND ME YOUR I.D. FOR PROOF OF IDENTIFICATION ,THEN THE ATTACHED FORM FILL IT AS DIRECTED THIS IS 100%   RISK FREE I WILL PROVIDE ALL DOCUMENT THAT PROOF THAT YOU ARE THE OWNER OF THE FUND FROM YOUR FILE. 
 
I AM GOING THROUGH YOUR FILE OF YOUR FUND  AMOUNT USD $55.5 MILLION BEFORE WE WILL  CONTINUE ON YOUR FUND TRANSFER TO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT YOU ARE ADVICE TO DOWNLOAD THE ATTACH FORM PRINT IT OUT AND FILL IT WITH PEN WRITTEN IN CAPITAL LETTER AND SIGNED SIGNATURE AND SEND BACK TO US THE MOMENT THAT IS DONE WE WILL MAKE TRANSFER TO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT  IF YOU DON'T HAVE A PRINTER YOU CAN TYPE THE INFORMATION OUT IN CAPITAL LETTER AS IT WAS LISTED IN THE FORM. 
 
THOSE INFORMATIONS REQUIRED ON THE FORM ARE VITAL INFORMATIONS TO PROVIDE VALID DOCUMENT FROM THE BANK WITHOUT THE FORM BEEN FILLED AS DIRECTED THE DEPARTMENT WILL NOT MAKE TRANSFER TO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT . IT IS NECESSARY FOR YOU TO FILL THE FORM IN CAPITAL LETTER AND INCLUDE YOUR PASSPORT OR PHOTOGRAPH ON THE FORM SIGN AND RETURN BACK 
 
THANK YOU 
 MR. DANIEL PINTO

subject: Re: Your Fund Transfer
body:
Hello Mr. Daniel Pinto,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite excited about this opportunity, although I must admit, it's all a bit new to me. 

I understand that you need some information from me to proceed with the fund transfer. However, I'm not sure what exactly you mean by "filling the form in capital letters". Could you please explain this process a little more? 

Also, could you tell me more about these documents that will prove that I am the owner of the fund? It sounds very official and important.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: Your Fund Transfer
body:
Hello Mr. Daniel Pinto,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite intrigued by your message, although I must admit, it's a bit confusing. Could you please clarify a few things for me?

Firstly, could you explain more about this fund? How did it come into existence and why is it assigned to me? 

Secondly, regarding the form that needs to be filled out, could you provide more details about the information required on this form? 

Lastly, I'm curious about the process of transferring funds to my bank account. How does that work exactly?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Your Fund Transfer
body:
JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A., 
Headquarters, 270 Park Avenue, 
New York, NY. 
UNITED STATES AMERICA 
 
 Attention: Customer  Your Fund Transfer $55.5 MILLION, 
 
 THE FUND WAS ROUTED FROM OVERDUE CONTRACT FUND AND RIGHT NOW U.S GOVERNMENT WANT TO PAY THE FUND BACK TO THE OWNER. WHEN THE LIST OF EMAIL OF OVERDUE CONTACTOR WAS SUBMITTED YOUR EMAIL WAS THERE. 
 
 THE FORM IS VERY IMPORTANT ONCE THE INFORMATION IS FILLED IN THE FORM IT WILL BE USED TO TRACE YOUR FILE AND ALSO TO MAKE A TRANSFER TO ANY BANK ACCOUNT FILLED IN THE FORM . 
 
 ONCE YOU FILL THE FORM AS DIRECTED I WILL SUBMIT YOUR BANK INFORMATION TO TRANSFER DEPARTMENT TO COMMENCE A BANK TO BANK TRANSFER IMMEDIATELY. AND RECEIPT OF TRANSFER WILL BE SENT TO YOU. 
THANK YOU 
 MR. DANIEL PINTO

subject: Re: Your Fund Transfer
body:
Hello Mr. Daniel Pinto,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite surprised to hear that my email was on the list of overdue contractors. Could you please provide more details about this contract? I don't recall being involved in any such agreement.

Also, could you explain a bit more about the form that needs to be filled out? What kind of information does it require?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: Your Fund Transfer
body:

subject: Re: Your Fund Transfer
body:
Hello Mr. Daniel Pinto,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your detailed instructions on how to proceed with the fund transfer. However, I have a few questions before we move forward.

Firstly, could you please explain why my file has been selected for this fund transfer? Also, could you provide more information about where these funds are coming from?

Secondly, I'm not quite sure about the process of filling out the form. Could you possibly guide me through it step by step? 

Lastly, I would like to know more about the documents that will prove my ownership of the funds. What kind of documents should I expect?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Daniel
